game.name: Goblin Cleanup
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 던전을 청소하고 재정비해야 하는 협동 청소 게임입니다. 자자, 다음 모험가들이 던전을 완료하러 오기 전에 서둘러 주세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A co-op cleaning game where you have to clean and rearrange a dungeon before the next adventurers come to complete it again.

reviewHighlights.text: The game started out really good but when it reached the frozen area all the joy disappeared. The dragon constantly flying over killing you no matter...
I would like to say I recommend this game as I love it's concept and art style, but in good faith I can't say that. This game is almost 20 dollars and...
